text: thuma bddalna alhalat altayibat al'uwlaa makan alhalat alsayiyati, fa'asbahuu fi eafiat fi 'abdanihim, wsaeat warakha' fi 'amwalihim; 'iimhalana lahuma, walaealahum yashkuruna, falam yufid maeahum klu dhalika, walam yaetabiruu walam yantahuu emma hum fiha, waqaluu: hadhih eadat aldahr fi 'ahlihi, yawm khayr wayawm shurin, wahu ma jaraa liabayina min qabla, fa'akhadhnahum bialeadhab faj'atan wahum aminuna, la yukhtir lahum alhulak ealaa biala
